sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-player
    v-if="isShow"
    :music="musicList[0]"
    :list="musicList"
    :mini="true"
    :float="true"
    :showlrc="true"
    :mutex=""
    autoplay
    mode="circulation"
    repeat="repeat-all"
     :style="{ top: '80vh',height:'66px'}"
  />
</template>
 
<script>
import axios from "axios";
import APlayer from "vue-aplayer";

export default {
  name: "DefaultLayout",
  components: { APlayer },
  data() {
    return {
      // 音频列表
      musicList: [],
      isShow: false
    };
  },
  created() {},
  mounted() {
    this.getMusic();
  },
  beforeDestroy() {
    this.isShow = false;
  },
  methods: {
    getMusic() {
      this.$nextTick(() => {
        axios.get("/musicList/index.json").then(res => {
          console.log(res.data, "responseresponseresponse");
          this.musicList = res.data.musicList;
          // 如果不使用 v-if，会导致播放器已经渲染好了才给值，那自动播放会失效
          this.isShow = true;
        });
      });
    }
  }
};
</script>
